mapper.update:
UPDATE NEU_CLOCKIN_C SET
NEU_CLOCKIN_STARTIN=#{neu_clockin_startin,jdbcType=BIGINT},
NEU_CLOCKIN_STARTOUT=#{neu_clockin_startout,jdbcType=BIGINT},
NEU_EMPNO=#{neu_empno ,jdbcType=BIGINT},
NEU_RETROACTIVEIN=#{neu_retroactivein ,jdbcType=BIGINT},
NEU_RETROACTIVEOUT=#{neu_retroactiveout ,jdbcType=BIGINT},
WHERE NEU_CLOCKIN_ID=#{neu_clockin_id}
mapper.select: SELECT RN,NEU_CLOCKIN_ID,NEU_CLOCKIN_STARTIN,NEU_CLOCKIN_STARTOUT,NEU_EMPNO,NEU_RETROACTIVEIN,NEU_RETROACTIVEOUT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN,NEU_CLOCKIN_ID,NEU_CLOCKIN_STARTIN,NEU_CLOCKIN_STARTOUT,NEU_EMPNO,NEU_RETROACTIVEIN,NEU_RETROACTIVEOUT FROM NEU_CLOCKIN_C ) WHERE RN BETWEEN (#{page}-1)*(#{total}+1) AND (#{page})*(#{total})
